participant_1.background:
My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend.
I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things.
My family works to support my dreams.
people do not like me too much but i like them anyways.
i am a karate black belt.

participant_2.background:
I am a police officer who has to run after criminals in my boots, but I still enjoy playing basketball in my free time.
I listen to jazz because it's a timeless genre that's perfect for relaxing in my vintage-styled home.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
zebras are my favorite animals.
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.

content.text: Doing well, thanks! I'm excited for my new cosplay costume to come in the mail.
Oh cool, what character are you cosplaying as?
I'm cosplaying as Sailor Moon! I've always loved the anime and I'm really looking forward to putting on the costume.
That's awesome! I've never been to a cosplay convention before but I've always wanted to go.
You should go! They're so much fun and you get to meet people who are into the same things you are.
I might have to check one out sometime. Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to read comic books. I have a huge collection of them and I love to read them for fun or to take my mind off of things.
That's cool! I used to read a lot of comic books when I was younger but I haven't read one in a while.
You should start reading them again! There are so many great comics out there.
I might have to check some out. Do you have any recommendations?
Sure, I have a few. I really like the new Batman series that's coming out right now.
I've heard good things about that one. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's really good.
